content: BOSTON  May 31 Major investors put U.S. industry on notice on Wednesday that climate change matters  even as reports emerged that President Donald Trump plans to withdraw the United States from an international pact to fight global warming.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Exxon vote shows Wall St diverging from Trump on climate change

content: DALLAS (Reuters Breakingviews) - Exxon Mobil shareholders have finally won a long-sought climate-change victory. Over 60 percent of them backed a move that forces the $340 billion oil giant to ramp up global-warming disclosure  up from under 40 percent in a similar attempt last year. Exxon already embraces the debate more than most. But shareholders want the company to be more forthcoming. Holdout industry peers will have to follow or risk investor ire.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Exxon climate vote puts sector on notice

content: By David Randall     NEW YORK  April 18 After several false starts over the last two years  U.S. fund managers are betting that energy stocks have finally hit bottom.      Firms including T. Rowe Price  Fidelity  and American Funds have been adding shares of exploration and production companies that they say have the most to gain from oil prices stabilizing. The price of oil fell from $115 a barrel to $27.88 between June 2014 and January of this year  yet is up more than 50 percent s
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Fund managers  convinced oil bottom is here  buy up energy stocks

title: Occidental Petroleum boosts 2015 production outlook

content: May 6 Occidental Petroleum Corp boosted its 2015 production forecast on Wednesday after reporting an adjusted quarterly profit in line with expectations as cost cuts helped balance  the recent drop in oil prices.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Occidental Petroleum boosts 2015 production outlook

content: May 6 Oil and natural gas producer Occidental Petroleum Corp reported a quarterly loss on Wednesday as the recent drop in oil prices eroded results.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Occidental Petroleum posts quarterly loss on low oil prices

content: May 5 Occidental Petroleum Corp said on Tuesday that executive Vicki Hollub will replace Chief Executive Steve Chazen after "a thorough transition period."
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Occidental Petroleum unveils CEO succession plan

content: NEW YORK Oil prices eased off 2015 highs on Friday after Iraq said its crude oil exports hit a record in April  and on pressure from a stronger dollar.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Oil off 2015 highs on record Iraq exports  strong dollar

content: TOKYO/ABU DHABI  April 27 Japan's Inpex Corp  became the first Asian oil company to get a stake in a new 40-year onshore oil concession in Abu Dhabi  joining France's Total in developing the United Arab Emirates' (UAE) biggest oilfields.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Japan's Inpex wins 5 pct stake in new Abu Dhabi oil concession

content: April 20 Occidental Petroleum Corp CEO Stephen Chazen says:
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: OCCIDENTAL-Occidental CEO says planning for $60 per barrel oil

content: ABU DHABI  April 20 Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) does not have a deadline for when to award further stakes in its 40-year onshore oilfield concession  the director general of the state run company said on Monday.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: UAE's ADNOC says no timeframe for decision on onshore concession

content: NEW YORK Two weeks of thin declines in the U.S. rig count have raised expectations that drilling activity is nearing a pivotal level that could dent production  bolster prices and coax idle rigs back to the field after a precipitous cull since October.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: U.S. oil rig count cull eases  approaches low point

content: LONDON  March 17 Azeri state-owned oil company SOCAR has hired staff from Phibro  the trading operation that Occidental Petroleum is winding down  to expand its London-based team  it said on Tuesday.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Azeri SOCAR hires Phibro traders to expand London team

content: LIMA  March 5 Indigenous villagers in Peru have reached a negotiated settlement with Occidental Petroleum Corp   which they had sued for allegedly polluting their lands over three decades  the two sides said on Thursday.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Peru indigenous groups settle U.S. court claims with Occidental

content: DUBAI  Feb 10 State-run Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) has signed a technical agreement with U.S.-based Occidental Petroleum to develop the al-Hail and Ghasha oilfields  ADNOC said in a statement on Tuesday.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: UAE's ADNOC sign $500 mln technical agreement with Oxy

content: WILLISTON  N.D.  Jan 29 Occidental Petroleum Corp Chief Executive Stephen Chazen quipped on Thursday that his larger rival Chevron Corp was too poor to buy the No. 4 U.S oil producer  but the offhand remark sent Oxy's stock up anyway.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Occidental CEO jokes Chevron is an unsuitable buyer; lifts stock

content: Jan 29 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1115 GMT on Thursday:
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: HOUSTON/WILLISTON  N.D. ConocoPhillips  and Occidental Petroleum Corp  on Thursday slashed exploration spending plans for this year  as the third- and fourth-largest U.S. oil companies attempt to cope with a steep slide in crude prices.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Conoco  Occidental and Shell cut 2015 budgets on crude slide

content: HOUSTON/WILLISTON  N.D.  Jan 29 ConocoPhillips  and Occidental Petroleum Corp on Thursday slashed exploration spending plans for this year  as the third- and fourth-largest U.S. oil companies attempt to cope with a steep slide in crude prices.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: WRAPUP-Conoco  Occidental and Shell cut 2015 budgets on crude slide

name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: BRIEF-Occidental Petroleum says bought 100 000 acres in Permian shale for $1.3 billion

content: WILLISTON  N.D. Oil and natural gas producer Occidental Petroleum Corp  reported better-than-expected quarterly results on Thursday as its Texas shale assets boosted total production even as crude oil prices slumped.
name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
title: Occidental results beat expectations on Texas production

content: WILLISTON  N.D.  Jan 29 Occidental Petroleum Corp said on Thursday it will close its Philbro proprietary trading arm by April.

title: Occidental to close Philbro trading arm by April
